title: The Future of React in 2025
description: Exploring upcoming features and trends shaping the React ecosystem.
longDescription: React continues to dominate front-end development. In this article, we look into new features, concurrent rendering, server components, and why React is still the go-to for developers in 2025.
author: Gaurav Jangra

title: Mastering Street Photography
description: Tips and techniques to capture powerful moments on the streets.
longDescription: Street photography requires patience, timing, and a good eye. Learn how to work with natural light, approach strangers, and create compelling photo stories.
author: Amit Sharma

title: Top 10 Destinations for 2025
description: A curated list of must-visit travel spots this year.
longDescription: From Iceland’s northern lights to Bali’s beaches, discover the top 10 travel destinations for 2025, with tips for budget travel and hidden gems.
author: Sarah Lee

title: Minimalist Living: A Lifestyle Choice
description: Why minimalism is more than just a trend.
longDescription: Minimalism focuses on living intentionally. From decluttering to mindful consumption, learn how adopting minimalism can improve your life quality.
author: John Doe

title: Designing for Accessibility
description: Making digital products inclusive for everyone.
longDescription: Accessibility in design ensures no user is left behind. Learn WCAG guidelines, best practices, and how to implement accessible design in your projects.
author: Emily Carter

title: The Rise of Plant-Based Diets
description: How plant-based diets are transforming the food industry.
longDescription: More people are shifting towards plant-based diets for health and environmental reasons. This article explores the trend and provides beginner tips.
author: Rohan Gupta

title: Home Workouts That Actually Work
description: Stay fit without going to the gym.
longDescription: Discover simple but effective workout routines you can do at home, requiring little to no equipment, perfect for busy professionals.
author: Priya Mehta
